title: High Court steps in as artificial intelligence, deepfakes threaten image rights of celebrities
description: Delhi High Court sets precedent protecting celebrities from misuse of name, voice, and likeness through landmark judgments.
content:
In November 2022, the Delhi High Court set a new precedent by granting a blanket relief to actor Amitabh Bachchan against the misuse of his name, voice, and likeness.
